song_name: The Green Dragon (feat. Billy Boyd and Dominic Monaghan)
artist_names: Howard Shore, Billy Boyd, Dominic Monaghan
lyrics:
7 contributorsthe green dragon lyricsoh you can search far and wide
you can drink the whole town dry
but youll never find a beer so brown
as the one we drink in our hometown

you can keep your fancy ales
you can drink em by the flagon
but the only brew for the brave and true
comes from the green dragonyou might also likeembed
